UnexpectedErrorAlert.title: Oops! We ran into a problem. Try reloading the page or coming back later.
UnexpectedErrorAlert.content: Something went wrong while loading the data. This might be a temporary issue, so please try again in a moment. If the problem persists, feel free to contact us for assistance.

Card.description: Select the language for your application interface. Your choice persists across page reloads and when opening links with different locale settings.
Card.title: Application Language
